channel.title: Blank Minimap
channel.description:
When I enter barrows minigame I get a black minimap that stays black even when I exit barrows, so I looked around in the coding a bit and found [code]getPA().sendFrame99(2);[/code]
When I remove it, all it does is make the map freeze when I enter barrows. So the map is either frozen still or black no matter what after entering barrows, is there a way to fix this?

item.title: Blank Minimap
item.dc:creator: @RuneEden RuneEden
item.description:
@RuneEden wrote:

[quote=“Team_Rocket, post:21, topic:468071”][quote author=RuneEden link=topic=585026.msg4158411#msg4158411 date=1352844804]
in my server the barrows is coded differently. When you find the secret tunnel you automatically end up in the center room where you fight off the last guy, then you get the reward from chest.
[/quote]

That’s probably because they were too lazy to create the Puzzles with random factorization.[/quote]

Probably, I am looking to re-code it later on though. So far I have fixed every bug and dupe known to the InsidiaX Source

Read full topic

item.title: Blank Minimap
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

RuneEden:

in my server the barrows is coded differently. When you find the secret tunnel you automatically end up in the center room where you fight off the last guy, then you get the reward from chest.

That’s probably because they were too lazy to create the Puzzles with random factorization.

Read full topic

item.title: Blank Minimap
item.dc:creator: @RuneEden RuneEden
item.description:
@RuneEden wrote:

[quote=“Team_Rocket, post:19, topic:468071”][quote author=RuneEden link=topic=585026.msg4158404#msg4158404 date=1352844478]
One more question, I never got the reason why barrows map was meant to be blacked out? I made my map visible during barrows and I don’t see what would be the problem if the players can see the map.
[/quote]

Players would be able to find the Middle room where the Chest is contained very easily. It would make it much easier to navigate and complete the Minigame.[/quote]

EDIT: I see what you mean now, in my server the barrows is coded differently. When you find the secret tunnel you automatically end up in the center room where you fight off the last guy, then you get the reward from chest.

Read full topic

item.title: Blank Minimap
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

RuneEden:

One more question, I never got the reason why barrows map was meant to be blacked out? I made my map visible during barrows and I don’t see what would be the problem if the players can see the map.

Players would be able to find the Middle room where the Chest is contained very easily. It would make it much easier to navigate and complete the Minigame.

Read full topic

item.title: Blank Minimap
item.dc:creator: @RuneEden RuneEden
item.description:
@RuneEden wrote:

[quote=“zyle1992, post:16, topic:468071”][quote author=RuneEden link=topic=585026.msg4158393#msg4158393 date=1352844075]

http://rswiki.moparisthebest.com/index.php?title=317:Minimap_State

Thank you, I didn’t realize that I could change the number and it would change the state of the map.
[/quote]

Yeah. Just removing the line doesn’t fix it, because it’s still set to config 2, which is blacked out. You need to set it to 0 to make it active again.

And if you have any more questions, feel free to check out the wiki. It’s there for a reason :)[/quote]

One more question, I never got the reason why barrows map was meant to be blacked out? I made my map visible during barrows and I don’t see what would be the problem if the players can see the map.

Read full topic

item.title: Blank Minimap
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

RuneEden:

The action of the logout packet isn’t what resets the minimap

It can.

P.S. Search before Thread creation.

EDIT: We’re done here, Zyle1992. Good job.

Read full topic

item.title: Blank Minimap
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“RuneEden, post:15, topic:468071”][quote author=zyle1992 link=topic=585026.msg4158389#msg4158389 date=1352843985]
http://rswiki.moparisthebest.com/index.php?title=317:Minimap_State
[/quote]

Thank you, I didn’t realize that I could change the number and it would change the state of the map.[/quote]

Yeah. Just removing the line doesn’t fix it, because it’s still set to config 2, which is blacked out. You need to set it to 0 to make it active again.

And if you have any more questions, feel free to check out the wiki. It’s there for a reason

Read full topic

item.description:
@RuneEden wrote:

Team_Rocket:

I hope you aren’t waiting for me to respond telling you EXACTLY what to do. I don’t spoon-feed anyone.

I’m not. The action of the logout packet isn’t what resets the minimap, I can’t find what does.

item.title: Blank Minimap
item.dc:creator: @RuneEden RuneEden
item.description:
@RuneEden wrote:

[quote=“Team_Rocket, post:10, topic:468071”][quote author=RuneEden link=topic=585026.msg4158296#msg4158296 date=1352839923]

The Minimap during the Barrows Minigame is supposed to be blacked out.

Well I know but like even after I leave barrows it stays black. And I have to relog just to make it go back to normal.
[/quote]

Use the Action of your Logout Packet. Place it on the Objects which lead to where the Minimap shouldn’t be disabled.[/quote]

The action of my logout packet doesn’t fix it.

Read full topic
